# LightShell

> LightShell is a lightweight desktop app framework. Write JS/HTML/CSS, get native apps under 5MB. Uses system webviews (WKWebView on macOS, WebKitGTK on Linux) -- no bundled browser.

## Docs

- [Getting Started](https://lightshell.sh/docs/getting-started): Install and create your first app in 5 minutes
- [API Reference - Window](https://lightshell.sh/docs/api/window): Window management API
- [API Reference - File System](https://lightshell.sh/docs/api/fs): File system operations
- [API Reference - Dialog](https://lightshell.sh/docs/api/dialog): Native file and message dialogs
- [API Reference - Clipboard](https://lightshell.sh/docs/api/clipboard): Clipboard read/write
- [API Reference - Shell](https://lightshell.sh/docs/api/shell): Open URLs in default browser
- [API Reference - Notifications](https://lightshell.sh/docs/api/notification): System notifications
- [API Reference - Tray](https://lightshell.sh/docs/api/tray): System tray integration
- [API Reference - Menu](https://lightshell.sh/docs/api/menu): Application and context menus
- [API Reference - System](https://lightshell.sh/docs/api/system): OS info and paths
- [API Reference - App](https://lightshell.sh/docs/api/app): App lifecycle and metadata
- [Tutorial](https://lightshell.sh/docs/tutorial): Build a real app step by step
- [Cross-Platform Guide](https://lightshell.sh/docs/guides/cross-platform): Handle platform differences
